OOC: Hoo boy, I hope that hiding like that wasnt cheap or breaking any
rules. I sure enjoyed my first fight though. I have to go though see ya
later.

BIC:
"Yesssss" screams Scorponok from his hit. "That sure felt good" he finishes
as he puts his cyber bee back on his claw. "Scorponok to Drill Bit, I am
leaving the enemy to finish my mission. over" with that he transforms to
beast mode heading towards the base.

OOC: Thanks, I might see you later tonigh.
